website_summaries.verdict: All the features of a traditional wooden Adirondack chair, but won't rot or mildew after rain or sun exposure. Expensive, but will last for years.
pros: Synthetic material resistant to rain and other outdoor elements
cons: Seating angle uncomfortable for some users

customer_reviews.title: Only "Folding" if Disassembled
customer_reviews.text: While I do like the chair, I think it is somewhat misleading to market it as a folding Adirondack chair when you have to disassemble it in order to fold it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five years in, as good as new
customer_reviews.text: We've had a pair of these for five years, sitting out in the elements year-round with no protection whatsoever (though to be fair, this is Southern California elements, so it's mostly heat and sun, with occasional rain — no snow or ice). We just bought another pair, so we'd have a total of four. The first pair has held up so well over the past five years that it's almost impossible to tell which chairs are the new ones and which are the old ones, when sitting side-by-side. This is by far the most durable outdoor furniture I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Harding

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed☹️ I ordered the Blue, Green, Yellow, Orange & Red Adirondack folding chairs. Blue & Green do Not match the same Arms as the others! No Front Overhang! When you get up they are Flush with the Front Legs! Not like this Picture!!!
customer_reviews.author: dennis m craig

customer_reviews.title: Love it and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and I had them put together in less than 45 minutes on my own! I am not handy at all so that should tell you something. They included a T handle hex key that is way better than those awful tools most companies put in their kits. Awesome chair and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Hettie

customer_reviews.title: VERY COOL. I hope they will stand up in the ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had plastic chairs of all colors in our front yard, but I always wanted REAL Adirondack chairs so I bout these. VERY COOL. I hope they will stand up in the weather like they are supposed to, so I am really giving FIVE STARS for the look, the color, the comfort, and the EASE of setting up. Form it up, pop in two caps and two screws and you're done.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Once it's together, it's a great chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. We also have a polywood bench that we have had for about three years and we love it. It is still in perfect condition, despite being left out in the cold, rain and snow all that time. This Adirondack chair is a great addition to our outdoor furniture. It is a little tough to put together...it helps to have two people to wrestle it into symmetry...to make the holes for the bolts line up...but in the end you will have a very fine chair to enjoy outdoors for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: jujubered

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and East to Maintain
customer_reviews.text: I bought these chairs and tables over a year ago. They were simple to put together, comfortable, and still look like new. What I truly like about them is that they are substantial/heavy enough that our Florida thunderstorm winds don't blow them off my dock - like our other patio furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly. Great Chair.
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for the price. Assembly was simple: unfold the chair as packed, insert two bolts and the accompanying washers and nuts and two large pegs. Maybe 5-6 minutes per chair. Most of that time is spent unfolding the chair in the right way and aligning the holes. These chairs are solidly built and very comfortable. Although I just purchased them, they seem like they are built to last. After ordering two, I am ordering two more.
customer_reviews.author: Stilton23

customer_reviews.title: Polywood doesn't honor warranty
customer_reviews.text: Beware, warranty and missing items are supported by Amazon.. says polywood customer service I purchased this item, and it arrived missing two screws. Polywood the manufacturer says I have to return the product back to amazon. Which makes no sense , when all I need is two stainless steel screws. It would be great if someone could contact me about the missing screws.
customer_reviews.author: noisybehr

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, smaller than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and arrived fast. It's not as heavy /sturdy as some reviews claimed but it will do for us for the price. I was also surprised by how small it is; its extremely low to the ground and not good for older folk or anyone over 220 lbs or with wide hips.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: A bit on the ugly side
customer_reviews.text: What I like? Lots of color choices, comes mostly assembled...just 2 bolts to screw on, and comfortable. What I don't like? Not that sturdy, especially the hand rest. There's side to side flex. Doesn't fold without undoing a dowel. And lastly the wood texture is ugly. Looks like crappy wood with a too thick paint job done by your misbehaving teenage son. I like the Lifetime chair much better. Almost half the price as well. But the Lifetime chair took me a good 30 minutes to put together and doesn't have all the colors that I want.
customer_reviews.author: YouMaybeRightIMaybeCrzy

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed, because I thought these would be great
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable-especially the chair back. I'm disappointed, because I thought these would be great. Now I have to spend $54 to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: freckles

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year-old daughter put this chair together herself in five minutes. We we just got it and are looking forward to enjoying it for years. We live in Oregon and need an alternative to teakwood as it so expensive. I like how heavy the chair is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IM NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the AD5030 classic folding Adirondack. It came 98% assembled save for two nuts and bolts. I should have been more careful in looking at the illustrations. The following are my concerns. [] The back is flat...not curved [] The arm rests are small [] The slats for the seats are narrow [] The overall chair is in the small side. The only good thing about the product are the choice of colors. Other Adirondack chairs for sale are extremely limited in color selection. Given the high amount of money they want for these chairs I seriously cannot recommend this particular model.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Butcavage

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality Control and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality control. Ordered two and could not assemble; no matter what I tried, the bolt and pin hole alignment to secure the chair to the front legs were off by 3/4 of an inch. Customer service recording gives you a 3 minute presentation on the Covid impact to the Company and says they are not responding to any new inquiries. They suggest to check the website for assembly videos, which is of no help because the chair in the video of course aligns perfectly. Thankful for using Amazon, both are going back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Solid, beautiful, durable
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and ergonomic. Comfortable without a seat cushion, but more comfortable with (surprise!). Have some that have been outside constantly for three years in Utah (15 degree winters, 100 degree summers) and they look and act brand new. No wear and tear whatsoever. It is worth it just for the lack of maintenance. Wood ones just don't hold a candle to these and wood chairs require restaining every other year plus the rot and eventual stripping of screws and the inevitable splinter. I think it's easily more economical to buy these as you'll run through 4 or 5 wood chairs easily. Just bought two more to go with my others.
customer_reviews.author: Northof100

customer_reviews.title: Mirror image of LL Bean's Adirondack Chair
customer_reviews.text: I have several Adirondack chairs that I bought from LL Bean, and I'm 99% sure this Polywood chair comes from the same manufacturer. The Polywood and LL Bean chairs are completely indistinguishable. The advantages I got from buying the Polywood chair from Amazon were (1) the chair was over 10% cheaper on Amazon versus LL Bean; (2) the delivery was free; and (3) I received the chair in two days on Prime, versus the 2-3 weeks delivery time quoted on LL Bean's website. The chairs are very handsome and weather resistant. Adirondack chairs in general get a little uncomfortable after a long sitting, so be aware of that when you are buying any brand.
customer_reviews.author: Smith&Wesson&Smith&Wesson

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these chairs so far
customer_reviews.text: I finally got rid of our plastic adirondack chairs that we had on the top deck of our boat house. They just couldn't handle the heat and weather. I'm hopeful that these chairs will fare better. I love the colors and the chairs are comfortable enough. Assembly was not difficult, just a little awkward to get things lined up.
customer_reviews.author: LKGMom

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I would only buy these on sale and had been watching for a good price drop for months. They ended up being an Amazon deal of the day and I didn't hesitate for one second to buy 4. I am not 100% bought into Polywood and the promises it makes yet but I'm becoming a believer. So far these chairs have held up well in the rain and in the summer heat, They were built really well, a breeze to put together and feel sturdy for a big 300 pound guy like me. They clean up easily (rag and some warm soapy water) and haven't chipped or faded at all. I think this was a great longterm purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RSevers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but I expected more
customer_reviews.text: It is heavier than average but I definitely expected more for the price. It still wobbles slightly when I get in and out if it. I weigh around 270 so take that as you will. That and this thing sits LOW. I mean super low, like butt on ground low. I've had to put a couple pallets under it in my shop where I use it or I couldn't even use it.
customer_reviews.author: john newman

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, fast/easy assembly, beautiful color, fantastic environmentally-friendly product
customer_reviews.text: WOW. I ordered this one day and literally got it THE NEXT. Super service! I love this product - the Polywood reputation is the best and the 20 year warranty cannot be beat. Assembly took 6 minutes (2 people is helpful because of the shape). Color is exactly as shown online. Sits great! We will use these for decades - may be leaving them to the next generation when we’re done, they last so long.
customer_reviews.author: M A Thompson

customer_reviews.title: So nice!
customer_reviews.text: I have one and getting another since my wooden one fell apart! No more WOOD! Easy to put together and so happy I get to match this one! When we move I will leave the wooden ones and take my plywood with tables with us! The Slate Gray is very nice and yes so comfortable! I don't have my cushions out yet but will in the summer and then it will be even more comfortable! Just power wash all the green stuff off of it after winter and you are good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: These were replacements for wood product units that rotted after only two seasons. These are much more durable and were purchased based on tables made of the same material that lasted longer than the wood product chairs. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Abreu

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair! It is durable, comfortable, and very attractive. The price was great. Warning, it is heavy! If you try to move it, make sure you have someone to help you
customer_reviews.author: Krissy, MD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and sturdy. Will not blow away. Does not need to be covered. Washes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Best chairs, durable and good looking!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 of these. I love everything about them. They are so much better than the wood ones we had previously. We bought those at bed, bath and beyond and they fell apart after a couple years. These are thick, sturdy plastic. I am not worried at all about them falling over!! I do recommend a pillow for the small of your back. We absolutely love them!! We got the grey colored and they are beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Missing Screws, No Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The chairs look good but mine came with missing screws on the entire front panel. It didn't come with screws in the box to bolt the front panel on. Polywood is currently not accepting phone calls to customer service so good luck getting in touch with anyone. All Amazon tells me is to contact Polywood, which you can't. Would not order a product from Polywood again. At $280 a chair, I'll pass on this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wright

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and sturdy for not tiny people
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a father's day present for my partner and he is a plus sized guy. Very comfy and put together quickly. It had a small issue of missing a screw but sent an email to customer service and it came within 8 days (during the pandemic, that was fast). Folds nicely when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Aymber

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible adirondac chair!!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product! Virtually weatherproof and maintenance free! Exceptionally sturdy. Should never break or need repair. Can be left outside even in the Michigan winter weather. Buy this and never wood or plastic chairs again. Polywood is the ideal outdoor furniture material!
customer_reviews.author: BLAH

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well-constructed
customer_reviews.text: Have seen mixed reviews on durability so time will tell if this was worth the cost. In the meantime, they were easy to put together (less than 5 minutes) - all you need is an an adjustable wrench/socket or pliers to hold 2 nuts as you to tighten the bolts with the included hex wrench.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: This chair is small and tiny
customer_reviews.text: I don't mind the fake wood, but this is basically a kids chair. It replaced a 40 year old real Adirondack chair that was made of real wood that the termites finally got to; this replacement is positively Lilliputian. I can't believe how many positive reviews this tiny little nothing received. I'd tossed the box so I guess I wasted another $250.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Last chair I buy...these are awesome looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Last chairs I buy...these are awesome looking and comfortable. Put 4 of these, in different colors, around my backyard fire pit. Added a pillow for theme decor and now we have converted my children's (now teenagers) sand filled play yard into a sandy fire pit with 4 Adirondack chairs. Durable and classy looking. Really hold up to the Arizona weather.
customer_reviews.author: Judy J.

customer_reviews.title: Really solid and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Really solid and easy to put together, so don't invest in the assembly. I'm short and slight, did it alone and without my toolbox. Holding up well in the backyard by the pool and in direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Nyo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, classy looking, and durable. The only negative I can find is that the arm rests are not perfectly planar (flat), with a little hump in the middle, which makes setting a glass on the armrest slightly precarious.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blachly

customer_reviews.title: I would never buy another brand!
customer_reviews.text: These are top quality and worth every penny. This makes 10 total Polywood chairs I have purchased and would never stray from this brand. The one time we had an issue with a part, customer service was all over it and replaced it without grief and very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: KLR

customer_reviews.title: Addies in Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: A perfect set up for our pool deck ....Happy colors - basking in the Hawaiian sun with no worries - most comfortable. Polywood product is very popular in Hawaii and you can see them in the most upscale beach houses. We love it so much ..... I ordered a black bench for under our plumeria tree. Aloha
customer_reviews.author: Mango

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs!!
customer_reviews.text: I researched the many chairs that are out there and these are the best for all-weather exposure. We leave in Texas were the sun cab be harsh, but these chairs remain cool to the touch and they are easy clean up with a spray of thee hose.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. Large scale, heavy, durable, timeless
customer_reviews.text: Great color (got the gray) although I may have gone with a brighter option so they’d pop more in our shaded lawn. Super heavy and durable feeling but will store for winter. They look great - a slightly updated traditional style. Large but not enormous like traditional wood ones.
customer_reviews.author: SKW

customer_reviews.title: dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: The armrests are faded and a different color than the rest of the chair. The fit/finish of one of the side supports near the front of the armrest makes the support bow out a little making the armrest un-level and the armrest moves quite a bit when you put your arm on it. There are several other fit/finish items that make this seem likely a poorly constructed item. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: N. Albert

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Chair assembles easily once you figure out how to unfold it the right way. Its kinda small, not much room to wiggle once seated. The main thing I disliked was the sitting position was too upright to make it relaxing and comfortable to sit for more than a few minutes. I had to return it and unfortunately pay for the return shipping. I wouldn't recommend and won't buy furniture online where I can't try before I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered five of these chairs all in different colors and they are all well constructed and comfortable. My weather can be extreme and the chair remains in perfect shape. Cleans up easily too.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Greaat quality.  Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive?.... yes. Worth the money? Yes! Very realistic "wood." Super easy assembly. Two minutes max. Looks like it'll last many seasons in all kinds of weather.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ridley

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very sturdy and also heavy. Though that is a good thing, I had hoped I could move it around more easily. Also because the pegs have to be taken out to fold it up, I just leave it out. But it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair but arms are a bit wobbly.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: super easy to assemble, comfortable, hopefully is less maintenance than wood. Cons: arms of the chair aren't as sturdy as I think they should be. Significant amount of wabble. All together a good chair. Time will tell if it was worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: nwsharksfan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chairs!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, love the sturdiness of the chairs and the ease in assembly. We bought 4 different colors and they look great around our fire pit! Comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Adams

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!!! Thick, durable and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: These are EXCELLENT!!!! So heavy duty, substantial and a breeze to assemble. Bought 3 & the ottomans. Will last for years and years. Very thick and durable!
customer_reviews.author: mnmstone

customer_reviews.title: Worthy upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I've owned lots of adirondack chairs over the years from hand-built solid wood to plastic box store specials. These composite chairs are comfortable and are standing up to the New England climate well. They look good, and clean up easily. Went together fairly easily as they are semi-assembled, so just a few minutes required for each chair. These chairs are heavy to carry around, so best for locations where they'll mostly stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Burns

customer_reviews.title: Happy With My Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased four of these Polywood chairs. They are extremely comfortable and seem like they will last a long time, having made it through pollen, summer, and the rainy season still looking brand new. Assembling was mostly easy between the two of us. We had one or two bolts with a tight fit that took a some elbow grease, but otherwise pretty simple.
customer_reviews.author: LaBelleEpoque

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to our front patio
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this chair. Beautifully designed and very comfy. The color is vibrant and the material is sturdy. It was very easy to assemble and only takes one person to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, sturdy adirondack
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Sharp looks. Comfortable. Nice material, easy to clean. I bought a second matching chair I was so pleased. Nice value, holds its own with pricier name brand competitors. Give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K Curtin

customer_reviews.title: Come Adirondeck Chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love the chairs. Easy to assemble and easy to wipe off after rain or morning dew.... Put lumbar pillows to decorate and actually adds to the comfort. Love having my morning coffee while sitting on these great chairs. Highly recommend. Pricy - but - you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Raeann Fracek

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Folds with removal of a peg which I hope doesn’t get lost. A little bit heavy to move prior to mowing but manageable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Watch manufacturer’s video for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Watch the YouTube video to help assemble - it’ll only take 10 minutes ( otherwise you get frustrated) Make sure you have a wrench to help tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy loves romance

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is questionable
customer_reviews.text: I am sure these chairs will outlive me...and they will look good until their final days. But there is something about the backrest that makes them a bit uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: zeeway

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice and value!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy and impressed with the quality of these chairs. Very easy to assemble only took a couple of minutes. They are very comfortable sitting and look beautiful. Excellent choice and value
customer_reviews.author: Laura in Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Never Paint Again
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. Love the composit material. Easy assembly. Love these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: sirmorrow

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $$
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs!! I have had plastic ones from your local DIY store and wood ones. Both fell apart quickly. These are a great size, easy to put together and comfortable. They look great! Will update review after blistering summer and freezing winter - but so far the family love them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We returned these. They are supposed to be similar to Durawood, they are not. The Polywood is not as sturdy or as clean-looking. I should have known that for half the price, you can't get something of the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good for $
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Not near the quality of Berlin Gardens but half the price. Comfort is ok and foldable is for shipping once assembled wont fold without assembling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing all parts
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of Ad5030gy these and one was missing all of the parts.
customer_reviews.author: NJ home

customer_reviews.title: A modern classic
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chair and VERY sturdy ! Assembled easily and looks great. You can tell that it’s quality and will last
customer_reviews.author: Fix-n-itup

customer_reviews.title: These chairs arrived fast and in great shape. They are beautiful and took 2 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: These chairs arrived fast and in great shape. They are beautiful and took 2 minutes each to assemble. Pricey but comfy. Love the warranty. would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Imbrescia

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Got four of these, one was misaligned, no worries on the return worked perfectly. Very satisfied customer! A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Carrzo

customer_reviews.title: Wipe clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright colors and easy assembly. They are easy to clean. They are not as sturdy as some I have seen but seem like they will hold up well. They are also comfortable to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: B Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, just two pins and two screws. Not indoor quality but fine for outside. I think they would be too heavy to bring to the beach. I'm 6' and 200 lbs - they are comfortable to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and I just love them
customer_reviews.text: Live near the ocean and salt is a problem. Chairs are fantastic. I just throw water over them to rid them of the sticky salt spray
customer_reviews.author: SandySue

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: These are attractive, sturdy Adirondack chairs. Not as low to the ground as many are, that’s a good thing. No problem assembling. Hopefully they’ll stand up to the weather in MA
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: We did a lot of research and price comparison before purchasing. We are very satisfied with these chairs. They are easy to assemble and the color is what we expected (grey). Shipping was so fast! Other vendors told us 8-10 weeks and we received the chairs in 2 days!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Sorel

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs! I am looking at those foot tests to go with them. I want many more because they are fantastically comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher & Andrea Hand

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: We use these chairs on occasion and we do enjoy them. My biggest disappointment is that they strip the screws when they assemble them so I have been replacing them with a larger screw as needed.
customer_reviews.author: M J B

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality chairs
customer_reviews.text: Solid chairs, heavy and look good. They should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but slats are wide apart.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is okay, not the best quality. The slats are wide apart and it makes it more uncomfortable. The size is good and I like that it folds up, but decided to return it. I found nicer for the same price local.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Kosunick

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice chairs, but they are a lot smaller than what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, more comfortable than it looks, and easy to clean. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: bookkook

customer_reviews.title: Almost prefect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, hoping it will last for a long time. Only reason my review is 4 stars: the pegs are very tight, require a hammer to remove if you want to fold the chair
customer_reviews.author: libraryjeans

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. Comfy, sturdy and good looking 😉
customer_reviews.author: SM125

customer_reviews.title: Have held up well
customer_reviews.text: Bought four in the spring and have held up out in weather all summer with no signs of wear thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, too low for me, chair.
customer_reviews.text: The chair looked less like wood & more like plastic. It was quite sturdy, well constructed & the lean of the back is very comfortable.. at my age sitting that low is a problem. Chair was constructed well, just too low for me.
customer_reviews.author: John V.

customer_reviews.title: Good Sturdy Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and it looks like it will hold up under outdoor conditions. Nice stuff.
customer_reviews.author: bkemmaus

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it but had to return because it was missing pieces. Easy return.
customer_reviews.author: dfw000

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very comfortable. It also feels sturdy and I think that it will last. The option to fold, which is also quick and easy to do will come in handy when it’s time to store them for the winter
customer_reviews.author: melissa sachs

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair, very well made, easy to assemble and adds a great pop of color to my patio set.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great love the folding for storage.
customer_reviews.text: These are quite heavy so would give it 5 stars if it had wheels, even as an option.
customer_reviews.author: lovethe14th

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs.
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find these on sale! Great chairs for florida.
customer_reviews.author: Ae1592

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair. Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair. Very easy to assemble. The color is as bright red as the picture portrays. I expect to get many more years out of this chair than I did out of the equally nice, but not as lasting, wooden adirondack chair it is replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B

customer_reviews.title: How to fold chair
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chairs but instructions need to clarify how to fold the chair. After a while I figured out I had to pull the plastic pin that was holding the chair together near the front. I guess it should have been obvious to me that was the needed but it was a DUH moment instead. Oh well, the company should add that info to the instructions. Overall it only took 5 minutes to assemble but 20 min to figure out how to fold it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant.
customer_reviews.text: Great color. Doesn’t seem as sturdy as some of the others we tried in person at the patio store.
customer_reviews.author: YourNameHere

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: these chairs are great. took me a little longer to assemble then i thought. looks fab in my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: EASY ASSEMBLY AND VIBRANT COLOR
customer_reviews.text: SO FAR SO GOOD.... VERY easy assembly. beautiful color and seem very durable. just like trek chairs i have seen /used before.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S.

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these chairs for my patio. They are perfect! I love that I can fold them for storage during the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Perseverance paid off
customer_reviews.text: Takes 2 people to assemble. Bought 2. First one took 20 minutes to figure out. Second one took 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great  chairs that look wonderful but the non-curved back makes them uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these chairs in a bright blue and we think they're beautiful. They seem to be sturdy and they fold up nicely. The only downside is that they are not very comfortable. The backs are flats. After sitting a while, our back started hurting. We eventually bought some upholstered covers and all is fine with the comfort, but now you can't see the the nice chairs. We recently bought the Polywood classic oversized adirondack with curved back and it is much more comfortable with the same pluses as these. If we were to do it over, we'd have bought all three chairs with curved backs.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs.
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research and of course on price too. Reviews were great and I took a chance. Love the chairs. Comfortable, look great and durable. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Roberts, PhD.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Adirondack!
customer_reviews.text: These are great chairs- sturdy, well-designed, comfortable but also not so slouchy that you can’t get out of them. We purchased the green and it is a true hunter green, saturated color. We are looking forward to decades of good use.
customer_reviews.author: vmsst4

customer_reviews.title: Verry little to assemble really nice
customer_reviews.text: To sit in around a fire pit very very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby joe jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Chairs
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly with two pegs and two screws (chair comes basically fully assembled and hardware is used to stabilize chair as you in fold it ) Great comfort -easy to get out of chair (sometimes these type of chairs slope to far back) Great value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are made from recycled plastic milk containers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Y.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Sturdy, quality-liking, nice and heavy material. I’m planning to pass it on to my grandkids a few decades from now :)
customer_reviews.author: M. Vetter

customer_reviews.title: Adirondack heaven
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are the best. No maintenance and they look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: AMH

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful chairs. They fold and are easy to store. Because they are poly they are a little slippery to get in and out of but we make it work. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. RACHEL MILLER

product_meta.title: POLYWOOD AD5030WH Classic Folding Adirondack Chair, 35.00" x 29" x 35.00", White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThe POLYWOOD Classic Folding Adirondack (AD5030) is a comfortable, stylish deck chair made from solid, heavy-duty, marine-grade HDPE POLYWOOD to mimic the appearance of painted wood. The weather-resistant chair comes with a 20-year warranty against splintering, cracking, chipping, and peeling. Weighing 34 lbs, this chair measures 29x35.75x35.75 inches and folds down for easy transportation and storage. Made in the USA, the Classic Folding Adirondack requires no staining, painting, or waterproofing and is available in a variety of different fade-resistant colors. The contoured chair pairs well with POLYWOOD’s OT53 Ottoman, XPWS0008 seat cushion, the XPWP0106 headrest pillow, and the XPWF0010 full cushion. Loosen any dirt and debris that may catch in the surface grooves of the lumber by scrubbing the bleach mixture with a soft-bristle brush
feature_bullets: Built to withstand a range of climates including hot sun, snowy winters, and strong coastal winds.
Polywood lumber is a proprietary plastic containing recycled milk jugs and detergent bottles.
Weatherproof. Will not splinter, crack, chip, peel, or rot when exposed to the elements.
Easy to store. Folds flat for easy transportation and storage.
Comfortable. Contoured to provide the comfortable seating expected of adirondack chairs.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
